name: blog-management-web-application
description: The Blog Management Web Application is a dynamic and user-friendly web platform designed to empower users to effectively manage their blogs. This application is built using the Express.js framework and follows the Model-View-Controller (MVC) pattern to ensure a well-structured and maintainable codebase. It incorporates various packages and functionalities to provide a seamless user experience.
author: brahim elkaceh
